name: Ethereal Eradication
description:
Blast through levels with a shotgun, using the recoil to move and the bullets to destroy blocks and tombstones. The only way to exit each level is to destroy the tombstone at the end and make it back to the start, but be careful - something might be inside.

Credits:

Art: Grafxkid

Music/Coding: Me

(Music will be posted on Youtube eventually.)
